abstracts.cdata!:
The World Bank Group and International
            Bank for Reconstruction and Development (IBRD) in
            particular, has for many years supported Indonesias efforts
            to transform its economy and improve the lives of its
            poorest people. Through a range of financial and technical
            programs, IBRD has helped Indonesians enjoy greater access
            to clean water and sanitation, endure far less red tape to
            start a business, rebuild after disasters, protect natural
            resources, and fight corruption.
